name: Anime Gallery Bot
description: Telegram Bot for downloading manga from mangasee using [kamyabazad mangasee downloader](https://github.com/kamyabzad/mangasee123-downloader)

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string. Get it from @BotFather on telegram

CHANNEL_ID.description: private/public channel id to store databse of the bot that is manga id, format for manga and latest chapter for updates

DATABASE.description: msgid for json database to be stored within telegram
